title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-A - Affidavit identifying party (agency)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-A - Affidavit identifying party (agency)

State Regulations
22 NYCRR
205.53
(b)(2) Form 8-A
(Affidavit

Identifying

Party-Agency)
4/2002
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of Adoption of
(Docket)(File) No. A Child Whose First Name is
AFFIDAVIT
IDENTIFYING
PARTY[FN1]
(Agency)
________
STATE OF NEW YORK)
)ss.: COUNTY OF)
I [specify name of affiant]:, having been
duly sworn, deposes and states the following: 1. [Delete if inapplicable]: I am an
attorney at law duly licensed to practice under the laws of the State of New

York and have an office at [specify address]: 2. I know [specify name of party]: and I know that he she is the same person
described in and who executed the annexed [specify]: [delete if inapplicable]: and who is now present before the Court. 3. [Delete if inapplicable]: I know
[specify name of additional party]: and I know that he she is the same person
described in and who executed the annexed [specify]: [delete if inapplicable]: and who is now present before the Court. ______________
Affiant

Sworn to before me this day of,. ______________
Judge of the Court
[FN1] This form affidavit must be executed
by an individual who is an attorney or other person known to the Court but who
is not the attorney of record in the proceeding. Form 8-c must be used where
the affiant is the attorney of record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
8-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
